campaign_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

campaign_name.description: Name of the campaign for easy identification

advertiser_id.description: The unique identifier of the advertiser associated with the campaign

budget.description: Total budget allocated for the campaign

budget_mode.description: Mode in which the budget is being managed (e.g., daily, lifetime)

secondary_status.description: Additional status information of the campaign

operation_status.description: Current operational status of the campaign (e.g., active, paused)

objective.description: The objective or goal of the campaign

objective_type.description: Type of objective selected for the campaign (e.g., brand awareness, app installs)

budget_optimize_on.description: The metric or event that the budget optimization is based on

bid_type.description: Type of bid strategy being used in the campaign

deep_bid_type.description: Advanced bid type used for campaign optimization

optimization_goal.description: Specific goal to be optimized for in the campaign

split_test_variable.description: Variable being tested in a split test campaign

is_new_structure.description: Flag indicating if the campaign utilizes a new campaign structure

create_time.description: Timestamp when the campaign was created

modify_time.description: Timestamp when the campaign was last modified

roas_bid.description: Return on ad spend goal set for the campaign

is_smart_performance_campaign.description: Flag indicating if the campaign uses smart performance optimization

is_search_campaign.description: Flag indicating if the campaign is a search campaign

app_promotion_type.description: Type of app promotion being used in the campaign

rf_campaign_type.description: Type of RF (reach and frequency) campaign being run
